abilities.name: Compound Eyes
abilities.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon has any Poké-Bodies, each of Butterfree FB's attacks does 30 more damage to the Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Select Powder
attacks.effect: Choose either Burned or Poisoned. The Defending Pokémon is now affected by that Special Condition.
